verses.text: 'Tis faith that purifies the heart, 'Tis faith that works by love; That bids all sinful joys depart, And lifts the thoughts above.
Faith shows the promise fully sealed With our Redeemer's blood; It helps our feeble hope to rest Upon a faithful God.
This faith shall every fear control, By its celestial power; With holy triumph fill the soul In death's important hour.
